channel.title: Neural-Networks on M'Sync
channel.description: Recent content in Neural-Networks on M'Sync

item.title: The History of Attention
item.description: A comprehensive analysis tracing the evolution of attention mechanisms from bag-of-words models to FlashAttention, examining the mathematical foundations and interdisciplinary connections that enabled modern AI.

item.title: Notes for Deep Learning with Python
item.description: Chapter-wise notes for <a href="https://www.manning.com/books/deep-learning-with-python-second-edition">Deep Learning with Python</a> with Python and Clojure code samples. The book is not done. These notes are evolving as I get deeper both into the book and the accompanying code.
